name: Lady Crime in Wizard Tower (MiniJam Edition)
name_original: Lady Crime in Wizard Tower (MiniJam Edition)
description:
Lady Crime in her first adventure steals mysterious gem from The Wizard and now she must escape from his tower. With power of crystal move around objects to pass through traps.

Game made for Mini Jam 60: Crime.

Controls:

AD - move left and right

Space - jump

R - restart

Right mouse button - pause/unpause

Left mouse button - when paused you can drag green objects around.
